name: PowerHex
description:
Buy energy sources and use power plants to provide electricity to cities. Get the most money until the turn timer ends!

A jam game by Felipe Buson made in 10 days for the Go Godot Jam 2.

Heavily inspired by Power Grid, by Friedemann Friese.
The board game has better mechanics because it's designed around multiplayer, auctioning and competing for resources/space, which I couldn't properly simulate for a single player game.

I don't know if the mac and linux exports work, since I didn't test them.
